nutritionDesc: The table below shows nutritional values per serving without the additional fillings.

index.description: With this little app, you can generate a beautiful and printable card for your favorite recipe, and then even share with your friends if you want to.
index.footer1: This project was inspired by this Frontend Mentor challenge.

create.title: Creating your recipe card
create.tagline: Using this page, you'll be able to create your own Recipe card page, and then save, print it or share with your friends.
